GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.Description: Check in Tbcache_refresh if entry got hanled or not
GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.SQL: select is_handled,is_error from tbcache_refresh where customer_id ='{Var Name=Ban}' and attribute_name ='CUSTOMER_NAME' and entity_key='{Var Name=Ban}'

GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.Description: Get segment_id and ban_group for the ban
GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.SQL: select ban_group,segment_id from tbcustomer_local where customer_Id ='{Var Name=Ban}'

GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.Description: Get a valid combination for ban_group and segment_id, other than current combination
GingerCore.Actions.ActDBValidation.SQL: select distinct ban_group from tbcustomer_group_segment where current_segment ='{Var Name=SegId}' and ban_group not in ('{Var Name=BanGrp}')

Amdocs.Ginger.Repository.ActInputValue.Value: select distinct ban_group from tbcustomer_group_segment where current_segment ='{Var Name=SegId}' and ban_group not in ('{Var Name=BanGrp}')
